articles.description: As more people get vaccinated around the United States, there are at least 100 fun things to do this summer to bring joy, do good, inspire and connect as Americans navigate a somewhat vaccinated new normal.
articles.content:
(CNN)As those who are vaccinated peek out beyond our masks, people are looking for a return to summers past in 2021.

articles.title: 'Things can be replaced, but lives cannot'
articles.description: All of the progress Palestine Children's Relief Fund made in Gaza was nearly lost last week, after its office there was destroyed in an Israeli airstrike.

Updated 1:00 AM ET, Sat May 29, 2021
